title: Roast chicken thigh, cannelloni of chicken breast with buckwheat salad
description: Delicate slices of chicken breast made into a wrap for buckwheat salad, served with mushrooms, radish and fried lettuce.
ingredients: 2 tomatoes, peeled, deseeded and chopped into small pieces
200g/7oz roasted buckwheat, cooked according to packet instructions
salt and freshly ground black pepper
salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 garlic clove, smashed and left whole
